Arbiter.text: Cancel orders in my telegram, letter by post

Arboreus.text: Cancel orders previously sent, and substitute following

Arbustum.text: Cannot cancel orders, already attended to

Arbuteus.text: Cannot cancel orders already attended to, letter follows

Arctos.text: Carriage must be sent for me

Arcturus.text: Carriage need not be sent for me

Arcuatim.text: Charge has been made in error

Ardenter.text: Am I to take charge of ---

Arefacio.text: Take charge of everything until my arrival

Arenosus.text: Whom do you wish to take charge of ---

Argilla.text: Cheque has been lost. Stop payment

Argus.text: Cheque has been presented and paid

Arguto.text: Cheque has been presented and returned marked ---

Argyritis.text: Cheque returned unpaid, send cash by return of post
